overview.summary: Select tensor data from a Uintah Data Archive.

description.p: Select the variable to extract from the Uintah Data Archive. Level buttons refer to the resolution levels of an AMR calculation, with the lowest resolution data being level zero. If "all" is selected a multi-resolution field is created which contains all levels of resoution. (Currently we have no tools for multi-resolution tensor visualization. View one level at a time or create a multi-resolution scalar field from one of the tensor components.)
The material button allows the user to select which material to visualize.
